traits.name: Battlemage
entries: Being within 5 feet of a hostile creature doesn't impose disadvantage on Zythan's ranged attack rolls.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Zythan has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: Zythan makes three Dagger or Arcane Burst attacks.

actions.name: Dagger
entries: Melee/Ranged atk +7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2 damage) piercing damage.

actions.name: Arcane Burst
entries: Ranged Spell atk +10 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. 27 (4d10 + 5 damage) radiant damage.

actions.name: Spirit Fissure {@recharge 4}
entries: Zythan causes a disruption in arcane energies in a 300-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in the line must make a DC 18 Constitution saving throw, taking 65 (10d12 damage) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Zythan casts one of the following spells, using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 18}).
